mapper.insert: insert into delv (or_no, delv_name, delv_nname, delv_phone, delv_road_a, delv_street_a, delv_det_a, delv_msg) values (#{orderNo}, #{deliveryName}, #{deliveryAddressName}, #{deliveryPhone}, #{deliveryRoadAddress},#{deliveryStreetAddress},#{deliveryDetailAddress},#{deliveryMessage});
mapper.select: select delv_name as deliveryName, delv_nname as deliveryAddressName, delv_phone as deliveryPhone, delv_road_a as deliveryRoadAddress, delv_det_a as deliveryDetailAddress, delv_msg as deliveryMessage from delv where or_no = #{orderNo};
